thread.section_title: Maine Lobster Now Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Maine Lobster Now | www.mainelobsternow.com
thread.title: Jana Black
thread.title_full: Maine Lobster Now reviewed by Jana Black

author: Jana Black
title: Jana Black
text: Have begun tradition of ordering live lobster for New Years. The first lobster lacked meat, so I contacted customer care with pictures and they immediately sent me a Certificate to replace the lobster. I looked for coupons and the 2nd lobster cost me $20 for shipping overnight! It was luscious and delicious! YUM!
